# SAM AI Insights
> Complete knowledge base for SAM AI
> Source: https://sme.ec/insights
> GitHub: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights
> Generated: 2025-01-27T10:00:00Z

## Overview

SAM AI is an AI-powered business operating system built on Odoo 18.
It provides intelligent automation across sales, operations, and development workflows.

## Core Capabilities

### Sales Automation
- Lead generation via web scraping (ScraperAPI integration)
- Automated outreach sequences
- Follow-up management
- Lead scoring and qualification

### Workflow Automation
- N8N integration for visual workflow building
- Odoo process orchestration
- Event-driven automation
- Multi-step business processes

### Intelligence Layer
- Context-aware AI responses
- Conversation memory and learning
- Agent registry and health monitoring
- Knowledge base integration

## Modules

### ai_sam (Core)
The central orchestration module providing chat interface and SAM's personality.
- Chat widget for Odoo backend
- Voice and behavior configuration
- Session management
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/modules/ai-sam.md

### ai_sam_workflows
Workflow automation connecting N8N with Odoo.
- Visual workflow builder integration
- Trigger management
- Execution logging
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/modules/ai-sam-workflows.md

### ai_sam_intelligence
Agent registry and ecosystem monitoring.
- Agent health tracking
- Documentation intelligence
- Performance metrics
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/modules/ai-sam-intelligence.md

### ai_sam_lead_generator
Web scraping and lead generation.
- ScraperAPI integration
- Contact extraction
- Lead enrichment
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/modules/ai-sam-lead-generator.md

### ai_sam_memory
Conversation persistence and context.
- Message history
- Session continuity
- Learning from interactions
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/modules/ai-sam-memory.md

### ai_brain
Core intelligence and reasoning layer.
- LLM integration
- Context management
- Response generation
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/modules/ai-brain.md

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How do I automate sales outreach with SAM AI?
A: Use the ai_sam_lead_generator module to scrape and enrich leads, then create outreach workflows with ai_sam_workflows. The Sales Agent persona guides you through the complete setup.
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/agents/sales.md

Q: Can SAM AI integrate with my existing systems?
A: Yes. SAM AI is built on Odoo 18 which provides extensive integration capabilities. The ai_sam_workflows module connects to N8N for external system orchestration.
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/guides/integration.md

Q: What's the architecture of SAM AI?
A: SAM AI follows a three-layer architecture: ai_brain (intelligence) -> ai_sam (orchestration) -> specialized modules (capabilities). See the architecture guide for details.
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/guides/architecture.md

Q: How does SAM AI remember conversations?
A: The ai_sam_memory module persists conversation history and context, allowing SAM to maintain continuity across sessions and learn from interactions.
URL: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights/blob/main/modules/ai-sam-memory.md

## Links

- Human documentation: https://sme.ec/insights
- GitHub repository: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/insights
